fields.name: Traumatic Vibes:
fields.value: Target a dead player. Learn the player who killed them and that player's role. This ability ignores any investigative modifiers. If your target wasn't killed, this ability self-roleblocks.

fields.name: Demonic Deal (Passive):
fields.value: The first night after you use Traumatic Vibes, there is a (75 - your score)% chance you die instantly. Each subsequent time, this chance is (100 - your score)%.

fields.name: Clawback (Passive):
fields.value: If you are lynched, one random player who attacked one of your targets will be instantly modkilled.

fields.name: Passersby (Passive):
fields.value: You may open two Hello Neighbors each evening. If desired, one of the two may be opened after the evening starts.
